responses.text:
**Getting Around ThesisFlow-AI** 🧭

Here's how to navigate our platform:

🔍 **Research Explorer** (`/explorer`) - Search and discover papers
📋 **Project Planner** (`/planner`) - Plan your research timeline
✍️ **LaTeX Writer** (`/writer`) - Collaborative document editing
📄 **Data Extraction** (`/extract`) - Analyze PDFs and documents
🤝 **Collaboration** (`/collaborate`) - Team workspace
📊 **Plan & Analytics** (`/plan`) - Usage tracking and insights

**Quick Tips:**
• Use the sidebar navigation to switch between tools
• Check your token usage in the top navigation bar
• Access settings via your profile menu
